name: Diamonds of Vegas - Slot Machine with Bonus Games

description:

Win even more when you a bonus game on every spin! You get a chance to play the famous bonus game DOUBLE OR LOOSE to increase your money win!
Get the feeling of Las Vegas in this Slot machines with bonus games, five reels feeling and spin the FORTUNE WHEEL! We have recreated the atmosphere and feeling of a reel slot machine plus the $ 100,000 PROGRESSIVE JACKPOT!

Download now and enjoy the thrill of winning massive amount of money when you play this new free casino slot machine.

You can play the best free casino slots machine and experience the real fun of Las Vegas in the comfort of your home!

Play our online casino games for free and experience:

- Incredible FREE CREDITS every 5 minutes so you can play your favorite slots game all day long

Download and play for free! Diamonds of Las Vegas Casino Slot Machine gives you bonus credits every 5 minutes so you can enjoy our game anytime! Place your bet, spin and win BIG!

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
